resources.string: You can go to the “upload” tab to start predicting images or view a history of all your previous predictions in the “history” tab. The app willmake a one of 7 emotion predictions: Angry, Happy, Sad, Neutral, Disgust, Surprise and Fear and a certainty. The predictions are made with convolutional neural networks which is currently the state of the art in image processing. The three models that are used are Inception-ResNetV1, MobileNet and Yolo3 and each having an accuracy of 69%, 67% and 48% respectively. In comparison, humans have an accuracy of 68 +- 5% when it comes to emotion prediction from faces according to one study. \n\nHave fun predicting!
